title: Login queues are down again
body: as the title says, can't connect to the login queues.

replies.body:
Hi folks,

Should be all fixed up now.  Part of our League service went into a funky state and we had to kick it to get it working again.

Cheers
Mindstar
Cheers mindstar. Give those hamsters a good kicking :)
Login Queues are back up and running.{{item:3117}}

I have a feeling this is the same as last patch. there was an issue with a 3rd party company that helps distribute the login load. it took a few hours to get fixed. hope its not the case but it seems very similar.
Random disconnected from champ sele and now cant log in iswell
